faq.bitcoin_desc: Bitcoin is a decentralized digital currency, meaning that it lacks a             central bank or single administrator. Bitcoin can be sent from user             to user through the peer-to-peer network without the need for             intermediaries.
faq.start_trading: Can I start trading with just $1?
faq.start_trading_desc: AceTrader allows users to improve their practical experience through             a variety of trading and financial products for as low as $1.
faq.is_safe_desc: AceTrader boasts one of the world's most sophisticated security             technology and maintenance team, and is constantly upgrading our             security systems to ensure the safety of user assets and accounts.
faq.help: Can i get help from trained market strategists?
faq.help_desc: YES. Our trained team will be there for you 24/7 to advise and help             you with everything to maximise your proffit.
